{"id":610393147,"lang":"java","time":"5 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1640961083,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/610393147/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Arranging Coins","memory":"38.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int arrangeCoins(int n) {\n        if(n==0 || n==1){\n            return n;\n        }\n        long s = 1;\n        long e = (long)n;\n        long ans = -1;\n        while(s<=e){\n            long mid =  s + (e-s)/2;\n            if((((mid)*(mid+1))/2) == n){\n                return (int)mid;\n            }\n            else if((((mid)*(mid+1))/2) < n){\n                ans = mid;\n                s = mid+1;\n            }\n            else{\n                e = mid-1;\n            }\n        }\n        return (int)ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"arranging-coins"}
